attributes.action: place employers at school establishment for 16+ for those looking for jobs
attributes.additional_details: this is helpful as it would decrease the amount of people on benefits as well as help those to get jobs with all this being mentioned if there is process for this schools should provide practice interviews or help with cvs if that’s needed for the jobs this is important to help the younger generation
attributes.background: this would be easier for those looking for jobs after school or those currently seeking for jobs to get jobs as many people around the ages from 18-24 are on benefits this would also help the employer find employees

rejection.details: This is a matter for each individual school and not something which the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for.
